doc.title: Lineup for Today: Ted Williams and Friend (????)
doc.plot: 'Ted Williams (II)' (qv), slugger for baseball's Boston Red Sox, introduces 'Bing Crosby' (qv). Bing then asks theater patrons to donate to the Jimmy Fund, a part of the Children's Cancer Research Foundation in Boston, Massachusetts. This public service film was "Presented by the Variety Club of New England and the Boston Red Sox".
